meanings.definition: To issue a certificate as proof of completion or qualification.
meanings.sent1: The school was certificating the students for finishing their courses.
meanings.sent2: The company was certificating the employees after they completed the training program.
meanings.sent3: The zoo was certificating the monkeys for their outstanding banana-eating skills.
meanings.sent4: The chef was certificating the new recipe as a crowd favorite.
meanings.sent5: The artist was certificating the painting with a signature in the corner.

meanings.definition: To provide official recognition or approval through a certificate.
meanings.sent1: The organization was certificating the volunteers for their dedicated service.
meanings.sent2: The government agency was certificating the products that met safety standards.
meanings.sent3: The magician was certificating the rabbits for their disappearing acts.
meanings.sent4: The judge was certificating the verdict as fair and just.
meanings.sent5: The explorer was certificating the map with a stamp of approval.
